thread.title: West Bancorporation, Inc. to Announce Quarterly Results, Hold Conference Call

author: cnbc.com
title: West Bancorporation, Inc. to Announce Quarterly Results, Hold Conference Call
text:
WEST DES MOINES, Iowa, March 23, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- West Bancorporation, Inc. (Nasdaq:WTBA) (the “Company”), parent company of West Bank, will report its results for the first quarter of 2018, on Thursday, April 26, 2018 before the markets open.
The Company will discuss its results in a conference call scheduled for 10:00 a.m. Central Time on Friday, April 27, 2018. The telephone number for the conference call is 888-339-0814. A recording of the call will be available until May 11, 2018, by dialing 877-344-7529. The replay passcode is 10115036.
West Bancorporation, Inc. is headquartered in West Des Moines, Iowa. Serving Iowans since 1893, West Bank, a wholly-owned subsidiary of West Bancorporation, Inc., is a community bank that focuses on lending, deposit services and trust services for consumers and small- to medium-sized businesses. The Bank has eight offices in the greater Des Moines, Iowa area, one office in Iowa City, Iowa, one office in Coralville, Iowa, and one office in Rochester, Minnesota.
For more information contact:
Doug Gulling, Executive Vice President, Treasurer and Chief Financial Officer (515) 222-2309
Source:West Bancorporation
